title: My First Crypto Arbitrage Bot
summary: Documentation of my first attempt at a crypto arbitrage bot.

title: Building the SolidVote Decentralized Voting Application
summary: I discuss creating SolidVote, a decentralized voting app on Ethereum. The journey involved smart contracts, Truffle, Ganache, web3.js, Node.js, and Metamask integration, leading to a functional and secure voting application.
